title: The Ultimate Cosmic Ordering Meditation
description: In this audio from the The UltimateA" series, international bestselling mind power author Stephen Richards has developed one of the most powerful ways to help you to establish a mind/body connection for Cosmic Ordering use. Each short meditative technique has full, concise, clear and easy step-by-step instructions. Whether you are just learning to meditate or want to discover new methods to deepen your practice you will find yourself guided through the steps to meditation practice and its relevance to Cosmic Ordering. This audio does not use self-hypnosis or subliminal messaging. There is also a free meditative music track for your own use.
author: Stephen Richards
